"""
Utiltiy helper functions of Machine Learning
"""

import numpy as np



[docs]def sigmoid(z: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Sigmoid function

    .. math::
        h_\\theta(z) = \\frac{1}{1 + e^{-z}}

    Args:
        z (ndarray): input value

    Returns:
        np.ndarray: sigmoid value
    """
    return 1 / (1 + np.exp(-z))
